headline: New Bayern coach Tuchel: Huge challenge to start vs. Dortmund, Man City
desc: New Bayern Munich coach Thomas Tuchel admitted he faces a challenging start to his new job after his surprise hiring to replace Julian Nagelsmann.

headline: Man City confident on Jude Bellingham signing; Real Madrid still in race - sources
desc: Manchester City are growing confident they can land Jude Bellingham from Borussia Dortmund this summer although Real Madrid remain in the race for the midfielder's signature, sources have told ESPN.

headline: Ex-Barcelona prodigy Bojan Krkic announces retirement aged 32
desc: Former Barcelona forward Bojan Krkic has announced his immediate retirement from football at the age of 32.

headline: Chelsea sign Enzo Fernandez from Benfica for Premier League record fee
desc: Chelsea have signed Enzo Fernandez from Benfica after meeting the midfielder's €121 million release clause, the Portuguese side said on Tuesday.

headline: Tottenham sign defender Pedro Porro from Sporting CP
desc: Tottenham have signed Pedro Porro from Sporting CP on loan until the end of the season with an obligation to make the move permanent this summer.

headline: FRA M: The End of the Regular 2022/2023 Ligue A Season!
desc: Round 26 marked the end of the regular part of the 2022/2023 Ligue A season with the final seven matches.

headline: FRA M: The End of the Regular 2022/2023 Ligue A Season!
desc: The LKS Lodz, previously undefeated in 18 consecutive matches, experienced their first loss in the Tauron Liga this season in a closely fought match against Chemik Police.

headline: ITA W: Scandicci triumphs in the tie-break after a great match lasting over two hours in Cuneo
desc: Cuneo Granda S.Bernardo suffered a heart-breaking loss to Savino Del Bene Scandicci in a thrilling match that had fans on the edge of their seats in the Italian Serie A1.

headline: TRICKY OPENER FOR DEFENDING CHAMPS; MINIONS WITHDRAW
desc: Men’s doubles defending champions Muhammad Shohibul Fikri/Bagas Maulana begin their campaign to retain their title at the YONEX All England with a challenging first round against Korean veterans Kim Gi Jung/Kim Sa Rang in the first match of the opening day.

headline: NG TZE YONG SPRINGS SURPRISE FOR AXELSEN
desc: Ng Tze Yong couldn’t have hoped for a more memorable debut at the All England as the Malaysian punched above his weight to knock out defending champion Viktor Axelsen in the second round.

headline: DADDIES’ MASTERCLASS IN COMPOSURE
desc: The ageless pair was at it again, this time in the semifinals of the YONEX All England 2023.

headline: ACCOMPLISHED MOTHERS PROUD OF FAST-RISING OFFSPRING
desc: Having played two finals at the YONEX German Open 2023 on Sunday, and won the men’s doubles, Kim Won Ho will be one of the players to watch at the YONEX All England 2023, which begins tomorrow.

headline: SMASHING STATS: ALL ENGLAND 2023
desc: Badminton’s oldest and biggest competition starts today in Birmingham.
